original: mam gyi sa bon dang / rdo rje'i mtshan ma las byung ba'i mngon bar byang chub pas bskyed pa 'jam dpal gur gum gyi mdog lta bu rigs drug gi rang bzhin zhal drug pa /

original: zhal dang phyag mtshan lha rgyud na gsal /

analyzed: bum pa bzhi las ye shes kyi lha mo bzhi bskyed /

original: thog ma thugs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs brgyad du thugs kyi dpa' bo dang / dpa' mo'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan rgyud las gsal lo //

analyzed: rnal 'byor pa drug gis sngon 'gro dang rjes dang thun mtshams dang / spyod pa dang 'chags pa zhib mo rnam par 'thag pa'i sgrub pa'i yan lag bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad dang ldan pa bsgom par bya'o //

translated: The root tantra, which accomplishes the three siddhis, the aims of desire, is also a hundred thousand verses. This root tantra is summarized in the half-goddess dakini-jala-samaja. The tantra is secret in other tantras, and the mere name is not taught. Vajravarahi-abhyudaya is the root tantra. The essence of the upadeshas will be explained.

original: lha'i mig gis blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: lha'i mig gis blta bar bya'o //

analyzed: tshad ji tsam zhe na /

translated: If one is not devoted to the meditative cultivation of the emanation and re-absorption in that way,

analyzed: rang gi mkha' gsang ni sna rtse'i bu ga la rgyu ba dang / mi rgyu ba'i snod bcud thams cad thig le'i lhar bstan nas nam mkha'i khams su spro'o// yang na khro bo phra mo rgyu ba dang mi rgyu pa'i thams cad pha mo'i ltar mngal skyes spangs nas blo dang ldan pa'i ba spu'i bu gnas khro bo phra mo'i sprin

original: spro bar bya'o //
analyzed: spro bar bya'o //

original: le'u bcu drug pa'i 'grel pa'o /

original: // / dbang po rtul po'i bsgom pa bshad nas /

analyzed: rgyas bshad ni tshad med pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba lnga bsgoms nas /

original: 'byung ba bzhi ri rab sna chogs rdo rje dang / bh'um las gyur pa las gzhal yas khang bskyed la lha rnams mngon par byang chub pa lnga'i rim pas skad cig gis bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor gtso bo rnam par bsgom pa dang / 'khor yang rnam par bsgom mo //

translated: The celestial mansion arises from the four elements, Mount Meru, the vajra cross, and the syllable bhr≈´·πÉ. The deities are generated in an instant through the five stages of manifest enlightenment.

analyzed: zhal bzhi ba la phyag bzhi ba //

analyzed: zhes bya ba nas /

analyzed: dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog gi phyag dang phyag mtshan la sogs pa ni go sla'o //

analyzed: las kyi rgyal mchog gi sngar bshad pa'i cho ga bzhin du go cha bskon pa dang / ye shes sems dpa' gzhug pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / spro bsdu bsgom pa dang / gsang sngags dpa' bo dang dpa' mo rang gi ming nas brjod pas bzlas pa bya'o //

analyzed: thod pa bzhi las bdud rtsi mchog yin gyis brlabs nas tshim par bya /

original: sku gsungs thugs kyi 'khor lo gsum gyi rim pas spro bsdu byas pa'i rjes la /
analyzed: sku gsungs thugs kyi 'khor lo gsum gyi rim pas spro bsdu byas pa'i rjes la /
translated: After the sequence of emanation and withdrawal of the three wheels of body, speech, and mind,

original: ngag gis bzlas pa bya yin no //
analyzed: ngag gis bzlas pa bya yin no //

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /

original: zhal dang phyag nyung bas dbang po 'bring bo'i sgom pa yin no //
analyzed: zhal dang phyag nyung bas dbang po 'bring bo'i sgom pa yin no //

analyzed: le'u bcu bdun pa'i 'grel pa'o /

original: // / de ltar dbang po 'bring po'i bsgom pa bshad nas /
analyzed: // / de ltar dbang po 'bring po'i bsgom pa bshad nas /

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //

analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /

analyzed: tshigs bcad gnyis bo de ni mdor bstan pa yin no //

analyzed: sngon du 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor lnga rdzogs nas / ldang ba'i rnal 'byor 'byung ba bzhi'i ri rab dang bcas pa sna tshogs rdo rje dang padma bskyed la /

translated: From the union of Alikali, in the center of a multicolored vajra and lotus, in the center of a sun mandala of glorious Heruka, arises the celestial mansion with the eight charnel grounds, surrounded by a vajra fence and a ring of fire, generated by spontaneous presence.

original: mgon po zhal gsum pa ni rnam thar sgo gsum mo //
analyzed: mgon po zhal gsum pa ni rnam thar sgo gsum mo //
translated: The lord with three faces is the three gates of liberation.

original: phyag drug ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug /'khor thams cad kyang zhal gsum phyag drug pa sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni rgyud na gsal bas ma bshad do //

original: gtso bo bskyed pa ni bsnyen pa /
analyzed: gtso bo bskyed pa ni bsnyen pa /

analyzed: 'khor bskyed pa ni nye bsnyen /

translated: this supreme activity is the donning of the armor, the invocation of the awareness beings, the offering of the outer offerings of water for welcoming and flowers, and so on, and the inner offering of the five elixirs, and so on, and the meditation on the single taste after the conferral of empowerment.

original: mo // srog dang rtsol ba dbugs 'byung rngub bkag la shes shes kyi bzlas pa'i lha'i sbyor ba'i spro bsdu bsgom pa dang / bdud rtsi lngas lha thams cad la mchog pa dang / 'khor lo'i dam tshig gi ngag gi bzlas pa khro bo 'brug sgra lta mu'i tshig gi bzlas pa bya'o //
analyzed: mo // srog dang rtsol ba dbugs 'byung rngub bkag la shes shes kyi bzlas pa'i lha'i sbyor ba'i spro bsdu bsgom pa dang / bdud rtsi lngas lha thams cad la mchog pa dang / 'khor lo'i dam tshig gi ngag gi bzlas pa khro bo 'brug sgra lta mu'i tshig gi bzlas pa bya'o //
translated: The mantra repetition of the deities is the meditation on the emanation and gathering of the deities by the repetition of the mantra om ƒÅh h≈´·πÉ while blocking the exhalation and inhalation of the breath.

original: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi bzlas pa yang lha so sor mnyam par bzhag la /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi bzlas pa yang lha so sor mnyam par bzhag la /
translated: The mantra repetition of all the ma·πá·∏çalas is the equipoise on each deity.

original: shes rab dang thabs kyi bzlas pa dang bo dang dpa' mo so so'i nga ro kha nas mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar bzlas na mngon sum du lha mthong nas mchog gi dngos grub stsol lo //

translated: If one performs the mantra repetition of the mantra repetition of the hero and heroine, the mantra repetition of the hero and heroine, with the mantra repetition of wisdom and method, and the mantra repetition of the individual voices of the heroines, like a whirling firebrand, then, having seen the deity in actuality, the supreme attainment is granted.

original: bzlas pa'i sngags ni go sla bas ma bshad do //
analyzed: bzlas pa'i sngags ni go sla bas ma bshad do //
translated: The mantra repetition is easy to understand, so it is not explained.

analyzed: bsgom pa dang bzlas pas du ba na /

analyzed: yang bdud rtsi myangs la /

analyzed: dal bsos nas lha'i rnal 'byor la gnas par bya'o //

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /

original: sngon du 'gro ba lnga dang / 'dang ba'i cho ga bdun dang / dang po sbyor ba gnyis dang / dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog drug dang / las rgyal mchog brgyad dang / rjes kyi rnal 'byor drug dang / thun mtshams kyi rnal 'byor don bcu gnyis dang /
analyzed: sngon du 'gro ba lnga dang / 'dang ba'i cho ga bdun dang / dang po sbyor ba gnyis dang / dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog drug dang / las rgyal mchog brgyad dang / rjes kyi rnal 'byor drug dang / thun mtshams kyi rnal 'byor don bcu gnyis dang /
translated: The five preliminaries, the seven rites of consecration, the two initial preparations, the six supreme royal ma·πá·∏çalas, the eight supreme royal activities, the six subsequent yogas, the twelve topics of the session breaks,

original: mngal skyes la don bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad bsgom pa dang / rdzus skyes kyang rgyu'i he ru ka zhub dang / glus bskul ba med kyang mngon bar byang chub pa lnga phye bas grangs mnyam pa yin no //
analyzed: mngal skyes la don bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad bsgom pa dang / rdzus skyes kyang rgyu'i he ru ka zhub dang / glus bskul ba med kyang mngon bar byang chub pa lnga phye bas grangs mnyam pa yin no //
translated: and the forty-eight topics of meditation for the womb-born, and also the four topics of meditation for the spontaneously born, are equal in number by dividing the five manifest awakenings, even though there is no urging with songs.

analyzed: de ltar zhib mo rnam par 'thag pa'i don bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad bsgom mo /

original: le'u bco brgyad pa'i 'grel pa'o /

original: // / dbang po rab 'bring tha ma'i bsgom pa bshad nas /
analyzed: // / dbang po rab 'bring tha ma'i bsgom pa bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the meditations of the highest, medium, and average,

analyzed: rdo rje snying pos gsungs pa'i phag mo kun gzugs 'chad pas / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //

analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //

original: mdor bsdus rnal 'byor sngom pa ste //

translated: In brief, the vow of yoga.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo lnga mdor bsdus nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnal 'byor gyi sngom pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo lnga mdor bsdus nas ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnal 'byor gyi sngom pa gsungs te /
translated: This is the vow of the yoga of the mandala of pristine awareness, stated in brief, condensing the five wheels.

translated: The extensive explanation is the simultaneous emanation of the complete mandala of the support and the supported, in the instant of miraculous birth, after completing the five preliminaries and the seven yogas.

analyzed: g-yon ljang ba /

analyzed: drug pa thod pa'i cod pa na la sogs pa go sla'o //

analyzed: phag mo ni dmar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma yin no //

translated: Two hands hold a human skin.üîΩTwo hands hold a bell and a ·∏çamaru.

analyzed: gnyis kyis mgo bo dang gri khug bsnams ba ste /
translated: Two hands hold a head and a flaying knife.

original: phyag brgyad do /
analyzed: phyag brgyad do /

analyzed: g-yer ka'i skra sgrogs ska rags ldan //

original: zhes bya ba nas thams cad de ltar bsgoms nas zhes pa dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog rdzogs nas dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i go cha bskon pa /
analyzed: zhes bya ba nas thams cad de ltar bsgoms nas zhes pa dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog rdzogs nas dpa' bo dang dpa' mo'i go cha bskon pa /
translated: Having meditated on all of that, having completed the supreme king of mandalas, one should don the armor of the heroes and heroines.

original: mtshan dang dpe byad can gyis ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang ngo //
analyzed: mtshan dang dpe byad can gyis ye shes sems dpa' spyan drang ngo //
translated: Having invited the gnosis being who possesses the major and minor marks,

original: mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la dbang bskur nas /üîΩye shes kyi bzlas pa'i spro bsdu dang dag gis bzlas par bya ste /
analyzed: mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la dbang bskur nas / ye shes kyi bzlas pa'i spro bsdu dang dag gis bzlas par bya ste /
translated: having made offerings and praises, one should confer empowerment.üîΩHaving meditated on the mantra garland in the heart of the principal figure of the mandala, one should recite the mantra of emanation and gathering of the gnosis being and the recitation of the mantra of the commitment being.

original: sngags ni go sla bas ma bshad do //
analyzed: sngags ni go sla bas ma bshad do //

original: bsgom pa dang bzlas pa rim pas bdud rtsi myang ba'i dam tshig gi sngom pa la gnas pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bsgom pa dang bzlas pa rim pas bdud rtsi myang ba'i dam tshig gi sngom pa la gnas pa'i phyir /

analyzed: sgron ma sha lnga bza' zhing gnas dur khrod du rtag tu bzlas pa ba'o //

original: gal te ma grub na /
analyzed: gal te ma grub na /
translated: If one is not successful,

analyzed: mtshan mo bdun gyis sbyor ba yis //
translated: one should perform the practice for seven nights.

original: phag mo kun gzugs bsgom pa nas //
analyzed: phag mo kun gzugs bsgom pa nas //

original: bdud bzhis mi 'jigs pa'i dngos grub nges par thob par 'gyur ro //

original: zhes pas thabs mi snang ba dang / bza' ba dang bza' min bdud rtsi lngar byin gyis brlabs nas /
analyzed: zhes pas thabs mi snang ba dang / bza' ba dang bza' min bdud rtsi lngar byin gyis brlabs nas /
translated: Thus, the method does not appear, and having consecrated the food and the inedible as the five nectars,üîΩone should meditate on the yogic practice of drinking the drink and eating the food that is not to be drunk or eaten, and of being intoxicated and crazy with the dance of the one wearing the quarter-cloth.

original: bza' ba dang btung pa dang / btung min byin gyis brlabs nas btung ba dang phyogs kyi gos can gyi gar gyis myos shing smyos pa lta bur bsgoms na so so'i skye bos grib ma yang mi mthong bar rnal 'byor chen po sa steng na spyod do //

translated: The practitioner of the yoga of the great hero who is a common being should practice on the surface of the earth without being seen even by the shadow of others.

original: shin tu spros med kyi rnal 'byor ma bas ma h'a ru ti r'a bdud rtsi lnga dang / zas kyi lhag ma dri chen dang / dri chu dang ldan pa'i sha sna tshogs pa sems rtse gcig pas bza' ste /

translated: The practitioner of the yoga of the unelaborate yoginƒ´ should eat various meats that are endowed with the five nectars, the remainder of food, feces, and urine, with a one-pointed mind.

original: nang gi bdag nyid sgyu ma dang 'od gsal dang zung 'jug gi sbyor pas nyin mo rtag tu gsang bas mtshan mo gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: nang gi bdag nyid sgyu ma dang 'od gsal dang zung 'jug gi sbyor pas nyin mo rtag tu gsang bas mtshan mo gnas par bya'o //
translated: One should always practice in secret during the day and at night through the yoga of the illusion-like and the clear-light union that has an inner nature.

original: de lta bu'i spyod pa'i dgos pa ci zhen /
analyzed: de lta bu'i spyod pa'i dgos pa ci zhen /
translated: What is the purpose of such practice?

original: mnyam bar ma bzhag pa'i spros bcas dang spros med kyi spyod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis ye shes yi shes kyi mig la sogs ba mngon par shes pa drug thob par 'gyur ro //

translated: Through the yoga of the elaborate and unelaborate conduct that is not equipoise, one attains the six higher perceptions, such as the eye of pristine consciousness.üîΩIf one is a beginner, one meditates on the forty-eight branches in the Web of Magic.

original: las dang po pa yin na zhib mo rnam par 'thag par yan lag bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad bsgom mchog tu gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa yin na mngon par byang chub pa lnga'i rim ba'i dang po sbyor bas /

translated: If one is a supreme yogin, one meditates on the five awakenings.

original: dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog gi snod bcud cig car skyes la /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog gi snod bcud cig car skyes la /

original: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug /
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' gzhug /

original: dbang bskur / bsgom pa'i tshe na spros bcas kyi spyod pa'am /
analyzed: dbang bskur / bsgom pa'i tshe na spros bcas kyi spyod pa'am /

translated: All food and drink become am·πõta, and all speech becomes mantra recitation.

original: lag pa dang rkang pa'i phyag rgya ji snying gar gyi mchod pa @181b dang / glu'i mchod par 'gyur /
analyzed: lag pa dang rkang pa'i phyag rgya ji snying gar gyi mchod pa @181b dang / glu'i mchod par 'gyur /

original: dngos rjes kyi bsgom pa la tha dad med /

original: gzhal yas khang dang stod gsum la tha dad med /

translated: With the eye of wisdom, one sees that there is no difference in the six realms and the wheel of deities.

original: le'u bcu dgu pa'i 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: le'u bcu dgu pa'i 'grel pa'o /
translated: This is the commentary on the nineteenth chapter of The Illuminating Lamp, the commentary on the glorious secret tantra of Heruka.

original: // / de ltar rdo rje phag mo kun gzugs bshad nas he ru ka phyag 'bum pa bsgom pa 'chad pa ni /
analyzed: // / de ltar rdo rje phag mo kun gzugs bshad nas he ru ka phyag 'bum pa bsgom pa 'chad pa ni /
translated: Having explained the form of all of Vajravarahi, now, the meditation of the one hundred thousand arms of Heruka is explained.

original: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //üîΩsmos te / rtsa brgyud kyi rtsa rgyud 'dir //
analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba // smos te / rtsa brgyud kyi rtsa rgyud 'dir //

original: zhes bya ba ni rgyud 'bum pa las rtsa ba thams cad tshar bar bsdus pa'i phyir 'di'i don rgyas par der ston pas na 'di nyid rtsa ba'i rgyud yang dag pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rgyud 'bum pa las rtsa ba thams cad tshar bar bsdus pa'i phyir 'di'i don rgyas par der ston pas na 'di nyid rtsa ba'i rgyud yang dag pa'o //
translated: Since all the roots are gathered in this root tantra, the meaning of this is taught extensively there. Therefore, this is the authentic root tantra.

analyzed: myangs nas bzlas pa bya'o //

translated: The method is the self-appearance of the wisdom goddess hidden in the method, and the two bodies of the method and the wisdom are nondual. Having made the form of the wheel of offerings for the three types of disciples,

analyzed: rgyu ba sems can dang / mi rgyu ba snod kyi 'jig rten thams cad lha'i 'khor lor blta bar bya ba ni /

analyzed: bsgom pa'i dngos gzhi'o //

analyzed: thar pa'i mtshan nyid ldan pa'i khyon //

analyzed: zhes pa'i tshigs bcad gcig ni me tog ma la sogs pa lha mo brgyad kyi glu'o //

analyzed: chags pa'i 'dam gyis khyod ma sgyur //

translated: One should recite the hundred-syllable [mantra] at the beginning, during the empowerment, in the middle, during meditation, and at the end, during rising.

original: gnas gang du dgod ce na /
analyzed: gnas gang du dgod ce na /

analyzed: zab pa rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni /

analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa la brtan pa thob nas srid pa'i dpa' bo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa'i ngo bo nyid de'i sring ba bdag gi blta bas stong pa dang rang gi lus dag yid gsum bdag tu blta bas stong par bsgom mo //

analyzed: de ltar bdag med pa'i sems kyi stong nyid la gnas na /

analyzed: ji ltar chu la chu bzhag dang // ji ltar mar la mar bzhin du //
translated: and just as butter poured into butter,

analyzed: rang gi sems kyi chos nyid ni /
translated: the dharmatƒÅ of one‚Äôs mind

original: mthong ba mchod pa'ang de yin no //
analyzed: mthong ba mchod pa'ang de yin no //
translated: is seen and is also the offering.

original: de'i rgyu mtshan can gyis rdzogs rim ni gtum mo drod sbar nas snying ga'i byang chub sems kyi thig le bzhus pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dga' ba bzhir rdzogs par lte ba'i dbus su babs nas gnas bsams pa dang / yi ge gnas kyi mchog srog aa wa dh'u t'ir chud pas de'i dbus su gnas par bsams te /

translated: The supreme place of the syllable is the avadh≈´tƒ´, and so it is imagined to be in the center of that.

analyzed: de yang sku byang chub kyi sems dang gsung khrag gi thig le dang / thugs srog gi rlung phyir mi 'byung bar gnas pa rdo rje can bsam gtan gyi lha'i sku yin no //
translated: Moreover, the body is the bodhicitta, the speech is the drop of blood, and the mind is the life-force vƒÅyu that does not move outside.

original: de ltar mtshan bcas kyi rdzogs rim las mtshan ma med par sgoms pa'i gzung ba rang bzhin med pa dang / 'dzin pa rang bzhin med pa'i 'du shes med pa'am /
analyzed: de ltar mtshan bcas kyi rdzogs rim las mtshan ma med par sgoms pa'i gzung ba rang bzhin med pa dang / 'dzin pa rang bzhin med pa'i 'du shes med pa'am /
translated: In that way, the meditation on the signless from the completion stage with signs is the nonexistence of the apprehended and the nonexistence of the apprehender, which is the absence of discernment.

original: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhin du sems rgyun 'chad pa ma yin pa chags pas sems brtag pa ma yin chags par rgyun 'chad pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhin du sems rgyun 'chad pa ma yin pa chags pas sems brtag pa ma yin chags par rgyun 'chad pa ma yin /
translated: It is not a mind that is interrupted by attachment, like the meditative absorption of cessation.

original: gnyi ga 'dres pa ma yin pa'i ye shes snying ga'i dbus na /
analyzed: gnyi ga 'dres pa ma yin pa'i ye shes snying ga'i dbus na /
translated: It is not a wisdom that is a mixture of both.üîΩIt is not a wisdom that is interrupted by attachment.üîΩIt is not a wisdom that is a mixture of both.üîΩIt is a wisdom that abides in the center of the heart without reference point, in the unconditioned.üîΩSince it is not a logical reason of inference, it is the object of direct perception.

original: dmigs pa med pa 'dus ma byas la gnas pa rjes dpag gi gtan tshigs ma yin pas mngon sum gyi yul phyag rgya bzhi'i bud med thams cad kyi rnal 'byor ma dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i thugs rdo rje kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems las skyes pa'i
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa 'dus ma byas la gnas pa rjes dpag gi gtan tshigs ma yin pas mngon sum gyi yul phyag rgya bzhi'i bud med thams cad kyi rnal 'byor ma dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i thugs rdo rje kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems las skyes pa'i
translated: The vajra mind of union with all yoginƒ´s and all women of the four mudras arises from the relative bodhicitta.

translated: The offering of the four joys is supreme because it appears in the form of the seed syllable of the object of bodhicitta on the moon of the bhaga.üîΩThe seed syllable is the object of the bodhicitta.

original: de'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen dbugs nyi khri chig stong drug brgya 'gags pas ni mi shigs pa ste /
analyzed: de'i mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen dbugs nyi khri chig stong drug brgya 'gags pas ni mi shigs pa ste /
translated: The immediately preceding condition of that is the cessation of 21,600 breaths.üîΩThe object condition is the four seals, the dominant condition is the bliss of the relative awakening mind, and the immediately preceding condition is the life-force entering the dhutl.

original: yul phyag rgya bzhi dang dbang po bdag po'i rkyen kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems kyi bde ba dang / mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen srog aa wa dh'u t'ir chud pa las sa dang po'i ye shes kyi byang chub skyes pa'i ming ni rnyog pa med pa'i gzhung mngon sum gyi lam don dam snying po yin la /

translated: The wisdom of the first stage that arises from that is called the path of direct perception of the stainless scripture, the ultimate essence.

analyzed: gzhung gzhan rjes dpag gis gtan la phab pa'i stong nyid ni log lta'i 'od gsal yin no //

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni mu stegs can gyi don dam thams cad bsdu'o //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni mu stegs can gyi don dam thams cad bsdu'o //
translated: The phrase and so on includes all the ultimate truths of the tƒ´rthikas.

original: shes rab dman pa dang thabs ngan pas mngon gsum gyi lam la smad na mnar med par ltung ngo //
analyzed: shes rab dman pa dang thabs ngan pas mngon gsum gyi lam la smad na mnar med par ltung ngo //
translated: If those of inferior intelligence and poor methods disparage the path of direct perception, they will fall into the Avƒ´ci Hell.

original: de ltar le'u bzhi pa'i de kho na nyid kyi man ngag gis rdzogs rim dang / le'u bcu bzhi pa'i rim pa bzhi bsgom pa dang / le'u 'di'i thig le bsgom pa dang / rgyud 'bum pa'i stong phrag gsum gyi don bsdus pas phan tshun gcig gis gcig 'grel pa yin no zhes gdams ngag gis ston to //
analyzed: de ltar le'u bzhi pa'i de kho na nyid kyi man ngag gis rdzogs rim dang / le'u bcu bzhi pa'i rim pa bzhi bsgom pa dang / le'u 'di'i thig le bsgom pa dang / rgyud 'bum pa'i stong phrag gsum gyi don bsdus pas phan tshun gcig gis gcig 'grel pa yin no zhes gdams ngag gis ston to //
translated: Thus, the instructions on reality in chapter four are the completion stage, the cultivation of the four stages in chapter fourteen, the cultivation of the drops in this chapter, and the summary of the meaning of the three thousand tantras are mutually explanatory.

analyzed: le'u nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'i 'grel pa'o /

original: // / de ltar mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor bshad nas /
analyzed: // / de ltar mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the mandala of offerings,

analyzed: bdud rtsi myang ba'i dkyil 'khor ston pas /
translated: the mandala of tasting elixir is taught.

original: de nas sbyor ba bshad bya ba //üîΩzhes gsungs te /üîΩsangs rgyas thod pa'i nang du bskyed pa mchog sku /üîΩdam pa gsung /
analyzed: de nas sbyor ba bshad bya ba // zhes gsungs te / sangs rgyas thod pa'i nang du bskyed pa mchog sku / dam pa gsung /

original: sbyor ba kun gyi mchog thugs /
analyzed: sbyor ba kun gyi mchog thugs /
translated: The supreme body is generated in the Buddha Skull, the supreme speech is the sublime, and the supreme of all unions is the mind.

original: des dngos grub thams cad gsol ba 'bras bu kun rdzob tu aom sba zhing a'a:gsang ba dang h'um su la yang mi bstan to //
analyzed: des dngos grub thams cad gsol ba 'bras bu kun rdzob tu aom sba zhing a'a:gsang ba dang h'um su la yang mi bstan to //
translated: The result of all powers is the relative, which is concealed with o·πÉ, the secret with ƒÅ·∏•, and the h≈´·πÉ is not shown to anyone.

original: rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi snying la gnas pa'i aom a'a:h'um gsum de nyid mchog tu bzung na sbas pa sgyu ma dang / gsang ba 'od gsal dang zhes pa zung 'jug bla ma'i zhal nas bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi snying la gnas pa'i aom a'a:h'um gsum de nyid mchog tu bzung na sbas pa sgyu ma dang / gsang ba 'od gsal dang zhes pa zung 'jug bla ma'i zhal nas bsgom par bya'o //
translated: If one holds to the three, om, ah, and hum, which are located in the heart of all yoginis, as the supreme reality, then the hidden is the illusion, the secret is the clear light, and the union is to be meditated upon from the guru's mouth.

original: de bsgom pa'i gnas ni tshigs bcad gcig gis bstan to //
analyzed: de bsgom pa'i gnas ni tshigs bcad gcig gis bstan to //
translated: The place of meditation on that is taught in one verse.

original: sngos 'gro lnga dang 'byung pa bzhi ri rab sna tshogs rdo rje gzhal yas khang dang bdun bskyed pa'i dbus su nyi zla kha sbyor gyi lte ba'i h'um de yongs su gyur pa'i spro bsdu las sangs rgyas thod pa can gyi mchog bskyod do //
analyzed: sngos 'gro lnga dang 'byung pa bzhi ri rab sna tshogs rdo rje gzhal yas khang dang bdun bskyed pa'i dbus su nyi zla kha sbyor gyi lte ba'i h'um de yongs su gyur pa'i spro bsdu las sangs rgyas thod pa can gyi mchog bskyod do //
translated: In the center of the creation of the seven, the five migrations, the four elements, Mount Meru, the vajra cross, and the celestial mansion, is the union of the sun and moon. In the center of that, the hum completely transforms into the supreme Buddha Skullgarlanded One.

original: de'i rgyu'i rgyas bshad ni zla ba me long lta bu'i gnas med pa nyi ma mnyam pa nyid kyis zhi ba h'um so sor kun du rtog pa dag pa /
analyzed: de'i rgyu'i rgyas bshad ni zla ba me long lta bu'i gnas med pa nyi ma mnyam pa nyid kyis zhi ba h'um so sor kun du rtog pa dag pa /
translated: The extensive explanation of the cause of that is the moon, the mirror-like [gnosis], the sun, the sameness [gnosis], and the hum, the discernment [gnosis], purified.

original: spro bsdu rnam rtog spangs pa bya ba nan tan /

analyzed: las kyi rgyal mchog ni ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs nas go cha bskon pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / bdud rtsi myang ba ye shes mnyam pa'i dam tshig mchog //
translated: The supreme-king-of-actions is the supreme pledge of the equal intuition of the invited intuition being, the armoring, the consecration, and the tasting of the elixir.

original: ro gcig par ni rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: ro gcig par ni rnam par bsgom //
translated: One should meditate on the single taste.

original: zhes pa sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo lus ngag yid gsum gyi spro bsdu bya ba dang / ye shes sems dpa' nu ma'i bar ni sbyangs pa'i yon tan lha mo bcu gnyis kyi spro bsdu bsgom mo //
analyzed: zhes pa sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo lus ngag yid gsum gyi spro bsdu bya ba dang / ye shes sems dpa' nu ma'i bar ni sbyangs pa'i yon tan lha mo bcu gnyis kyi spro bsdu bsgom mo //
translated: The wisdom being in the space between the breasts is the meditation on the emanation and withdrawal of the twelve goddesses of the qualities of purification.

original: snying po ni go sla'o //
analyzed: snying po ni go sla'o //

original: ji ltar sgom zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar sgom zhe na /

original: shar zhi ba /
analyzed: shar zhi ba /

analyzed: sems can mos pa sna tshogs 'dul ba'i thabs 'dod yon lnga la longs spyod pa na /

analyzed: stong pas rgyas btab na bla med ye shes kyi 'bras bu thob bo //
translated: if one seals them with emptiness, one obtains the result of unsurpassed pristine consciousness.

analyzed: kha zas bdung rtsi lngar byin gyis brlabs nas 'chi med bde ba'i longs spyod kyi 'bras bu rnyed do //

analyzed: sems can thams cad lhar bsgoms pas zag med kyi go 'phang mchog thob po //

analyzed: 'di ni las dang po'i spyod pa ma yin pas mchog tu gyur pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i spyod pa yin pas /

analyzed: gong gi sngon du 'gro ba'i rnam pa lnga byas nas 'byung ba bzhi ri rab sna tshogs rdo rje dang gzhal yas khang gi dbus su padma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i dbus su yi ge h'um las rdo rje de yongs su gyur pa las sku lus sngon po zhal
translated: Having performed the five preliminary aspects as above, in the center of a four-element Mount Meru, a vajra cross, and a celestial mansion, in the center of an eight-petaled lotus, from the syllable h≈´·πÉ, there is a vajra, which completely transforms into a blue body with four faces,

analyzed: bzhi ba mche ba gtsigs pa phyag brgyad kyi dang pos rdo rje mtha' yas gcig pa /

analyzed: klu rnams kyi mjug ma chu lha'i 'og tu mnan par bsam mo //

analyzed: de ltar dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bshad nas /

original: go cha bskon /

analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' de'i thugs kar ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'i rdo rje rtse mo lnga la h'um nam h'um dgod do //

original: dpral bar sku'i 'khor lo /

analyzed: gtor mas kha bskang ngo //

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gsum bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o //

original: las la sbyor ba'i bsgrub pa'i gnas bshad pa ni /
analyzed: las la sbyor ba'i bsgrub pa'i gnas bshad pa ni /
translated: The explanation of the place of accomplishment for applying to the rite:

original: chu bo'i 'gram mam /
analyzed: chu bo'i 'gram mam /

analyzed: rgya mtsho la sogs pa klu yod pa'i gnas su bsgom bzlas bya /
translated: or in a place where there is a nƒÅga such as the ocean, do the meditation and recitation.

analyzed: snying po ni go sla'o //

analyzed: 'o ma btung ba dang / sbrang rtsi bza' zhing 'o ma dang mar dang bcas pas sbyin sreg bya /

analyzed: 'o mas gang ba'i bum pa brgyad kyis klu la khrus bya /

original: des kyang 'bab par ma gyur na /
analyzed: des kyang 'bab par ma gyur na /

original: smyung ba bya /

analyzed: de mi nus na 'o ma dang mar dang 'bras snying bza'/

original: tha mal pa'i tshig gis mi smra bar nam mkha' lding gi gdong can bris pa'i sku gzugs rab gnas byas pa'i mdun du bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po 'bum bzlas /
analyzed: tha mal pa'i tshig gis mi smra bar nam mkha' lding gi gdong can bris pa'i sku gzugs rab gnas byas pa'i mdun du bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po 'bum bzlas /
translated: Without speaking ordinary words, in front of a consecrated image of the face of Garu·∏ça, one should recite the essence mantra of the Bhagavat one hundred thousand times.

analyzed: ring bsrel gyi snying po can gyi sku lugs ma dri chu dang / 'o ma dang bsres pas sku @199a * //

original: khrus bya / chu bo'i 'gram gnyis kyi las byas pa'i gzugs brnyan mgo dgu pa byas la chus dbang bskur na char 'bab par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khrus bya / chu bo'i 'gram gnyis kyi las byas pa'i gzugs brnyan mgo dgu pa byas la chus dbang bskur na char 'bab par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one makes an image of nine heads on both banks of a river and consecrates it with water, it will rain.

analyzed: las la sbyar ba'i cho ga bshad nas /

analyzed: rgyud sde bzhi'i lha tha dad pa'i rjes su 'brang yang /

analyzed: lha de'i snying gar nam mkha' lding gi gdong can gyi he ru ka bsgoms na /
translated: If one meditates on Heruka with the face of a garu·∏ça at the heart of that deity,

original: chag 'bab par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chag 'bab par 'gyur ro //
translated: it will rain.

original: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This teaches that

analyzed: de'i snying gar phyir bzlog chen mo la sogs pa las brgya byed pa'i dus lha'i snying gar bsgoms nas las brgya byed do zhes bsdus pa las kyang gsungs so //
translated: one should meditate on the heart of the great repeller and so forth at the heart of the deity and perform the one hundred rites.

analyzed: gal te snying gar mi bsgom na phyag mtshan gyi dbus su bsgoms nas kyang las tshogs byed pa ni / mdung rtse gsum pa la nam mkha' lding gi gdong can gyi 'khor lo bris na ser ba gcod pa can te'u la bris nas me rengs par byed ces bya ba nas glang po che'i pags pa la bris na /
translated: If one does not meditate at the heart, one should perform the collection of rites by meditating at the center of the hand implement.

original: dpag tshad stong phrag brgyar 'gro 'ong byed do //
analyzed: dpag tshad stong phrag brgyar 'gro 'ong byed do //
translated: If one writes the wheel with the face of a garu·∏ça on a three pointed spear, it will stop hail. If one writes it on a peacock feather, it will stop rain. original: le'u sum cu rtsa bzhi'i 'grel pa'o /
analyzed: le'u sum cu rtsa bzhi'i 'grel pa'o /

analyzed: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //

analyzed: sku dog sngon po zhal drug pa phyag bcu gnyis pa zhabs gcig pa yum rdo rje phag mo zhabs gcig par bsgoms te go sla'o //
translated: Meditate on the blue body with six faces, twelve arms, and one leg, with the mother VajravƒÅrƒÅhƒ´ with one leg.
